text: Sir Geoffrey Winston Russell Palmer (born 21 April 1942) is a New Zealand politician. He served as the 33rd Prime Minister of New Zealand. He served as Prime Minister from 8 August 1989 to 4 September 1990. Palmer was born in Nelson, New Zealand. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:People from Nelson, New Zealand
title: Geoffrey Palmer (politician)
